Common.Highlight.Common.Text: New restaurants include Saola and Eight Settlers Restaurant and Distillary.
3/1,000 SF parking located underneath the hotel and office building.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The building is located within the Canyon Centre Development, an 11 acre development situated at the mouth of Big Cottonwood Canyon.  The project includes a Courtyard by Marriott hotel, a 17 single family development, multiple restaurants, a small City Park and retail space.  The site is within minutes of "The Greatest Snow on Earth" and many hiking, biking and walking trails.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Canyon Centre Office Building is an 81,000 SF 4 story office building at the mouth of Big Cottonwood Canyon.  The building is designed to compliment the Canyon vibe while exuding an eye-catching modern feel.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Class A 81,000 SF Office Building | Coming Fall 2021

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Unique Tenant Bonuses to Address Tenant's Needs

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Conveniently located in the Cottonwood Heights area, Old Mill Corporate Center I has direct, no-stop access from I-215 and is nearby numerous retail amenities and hotels.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Part of the Old Mill Corporate Center, this Class A office features onsite café, showers, locker rooms, secure bicycle storage, and access to nearby retail, ski resorts, golf course, and paved running trails for Tenants' use. Tenants will also benefit from the building's onsite ownership, security and property management along with complete generator back-up service.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Part of the Union Business Park, this building offers onsite property management and maintenance, immediate access to I-215, a high parking ratio, and outstanding views of the valley and the Wasatch Mountains. Union III is ideally located in Midvale with direct access to the Shops at Fort Union and countless other amenities.
